name: Random Dungeon (Stormyman)
description:
A prototype for a bigger game I plan to try making.

This prototype aims to have a randomly generated dungeon with a minimap that the player can see update when they scroll the camera through.

NOTE: Please wait about 7 seconds for a dungeon to spawn. The camera will move to the player when they have been spawned.

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys: Movement

f: Use the exit (yellow square) to reset the game and spawn a new random dungeon (It seems that some bug happens and the game freezes on the web) (Might be because I am setting a game object as child of a prefab asset?)

m: toggle the minimap mode (small, big, off)
